Problems for Islamic Teachers Online6 Things Stopping Your Teaching Growth

MOSTLY posting Important Program Details on Social Media makes it hard for students to find what they need. This problem is limit your students and stopping your success.

1
Students Don't Know What You Teach

They can't see your special skills

2
Your Qualifications Are Hidden

Students can't find your teaching certificates

3

Happy student messages disappear in social media

4
Students Can't See Your Time

They leave when they don't know when you teach

5
Price Not Clear

Students worry when they don't see the cost

6
Sign Up Too Hard

Good students leave if joining is difficult
